required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System Pre-market Trial
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multicenter, Single-arm, Objective Performance Clinical Investigation For Evaluation of the Safety and Effectiveness of MicroPort™ CardioFlow VitaFlow ™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System in the Treatment of Severe Aortic Valve Stenosis

lead_sponsor.agency: Shanghai MicroPort CardioFlow Medtech Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Shanghai MicroPort CardioFlow Medtech Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a pre-market clinical investigation aiming to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of Microport™ CardioFlow VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System for the treatment of severe aortic stenosis.

detailed_description.textblock: This a prospective, multi-center, single-arm, objective performance clinical investigation, aiming to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of Microport™ CardioFlow VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System for the treatment of severe aortic stenosis. A total of 145 subjects will be enrolled in 18 clinical centers within China. Clinical or telephone follow-up is scheduled at 30 days, 6 months, 12 months, and 2-5 years after valve implantation.

primary_outcome.measure: Rate of all-cause mortality at 12 months post implantation
primary_outcome.description: Rate of all-cause mortality including cardiovascular and non-cardiovascular death

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, and 1 year post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Mean prosthetic valve gradient measured by transthoracic echocardiography (TTE)(in mmHg)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, and 1 year post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Effective orifice area measured by transthoracic echocardiography (TTE)(in cm^2)

secondary_outcome.measure: Valve function- degree of prosthetic valve regurgitation
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, and 1 year post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Degree of prosthetic valve regurgitation including paravalvular leak and intravalvular regurgitation measured by transthoracic echocardiography (TTE)

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of safety events according to VARC2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, 1 year and annually up to 5 years post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of safety events according to VARC2 including all-cause mortality, myocardial infarction, stroke, bleeding, acute kidney injury, vascular complications, conduction disturbance and arrhythmias, and new permanent pacemaker implantation

secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, 1 year and annually up to 5 years post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of other TAVI-related complications including conversion to open surgery, unplanned use of cardiopulmonary bypass, coronary obstruction, ventricular septal perforation, mitral valve apparatus damage or dysfunction, cardiac tamponade, endocarditis, valve thrombosis, valve mal-positioning, and TAV-in-TAV

secondary_outcome.measure: Rate of major adverse cardiac and cerebrovascular events(MACCE)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: at 30 days, 6 months, 1 year and annually up to 5 years post implantation
secondary_outcome.description: Rate of MACCE including all-cause mortality, stroke, myocardial infarction, re-intervention, arrhythmias, and conduction disturbances
Rate of device success, assessed by death, the access, delivery, deployment and implantation of the device, prosthetic valve position and valve function
Rate of balloon pre-dilation success, assessed by the access, delivery, pre-dilation and retrieval of the balloon catheter
Rate of balloon post-dilation success, assessed by the access, delivery, post-dilation and retrieval of the balloon catheter
Rate of procedure success, assessed by the device success and the peri-procedural complications

arm_group.description: Subjects in experimental group will be implanted with the VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System

intervention.intervention_name: VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System
intervention.description: VitaFlow™ II Transcatheter Aortic Valve System contains a valve stent-VitaFlow™ Aortic Valve, a delivery system-VitaFlow™ Delivery System, loading tools, and a guide-wire

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
The Second Affiliated Hospital Zhejiang University School of Medicine
